page.title: 08CHILDREN'S BOOKS
page.content: Children's books are vrey exciting and interesting.My favourite books are the exciting adventures of the Famous Five.Roald Dahl books are excellent particlarly "The Witches".This is about a little boy who goes on holiday with his grandma.One day he goes to train his two mice in the ballroom.Later some ladies from the R.S.P.C.C.come flooding into the room.When all the "nice"ladies have sat down the ballroom doors are chainrd.The boy was stuck behind a screen in a room with all these ladies who turn out to be witches seeking to kill every child.After a while the boy is turned into a mouse,having been poisoned with the Grand High Witches formula.Eventually the witches try a taste of their own medicine.
